description_en: Total GET requests made to api.data.gov.my, disaggregated by endpoint.
description_ms: Permintaan GET keseluruhan kepada api.data.gov.my, dengan pecahan mengikut endpoint.
methodology_en: This data is aggregated from transactional records produced by web analytics tools which monitor user interactions across the data.gov.my platform in real time. The data does not contain any personally identifiable information, as there is no component of data.gov.my which requires an authenticated login to access.
methodology_ms: Data ini dihasilkan daripada rekod transaksi yang dijana oleh alat analitik yang memantau interaksi pengguna di platform data.gov.my dalam masa nyata. Data ini tidak mengandungi sebarang data peribadi, kerana penggunaan data.gov.my tidak memerlukan log masuk.
caveat_en: Although the OpenAPI was live from 13 Sep 2023, this dataset only includes API hits from 15 Dec 2023 onwards due to lack of disaggregated usage data prior to that date.
caveat_ms: Walaupun OpenAPI dilancarkan pada 13 Sep 2023, set data ini hanya merangkumi hit API dari 15 Dis 2023 kerana data penggunaan sebelum tarikh ini tidak mengandungi pecahan mengikut endpoint.

fields.name: endpoint
fields.description_en: [String] The endpoint being requested; full documentation of available endpoints is available via the [Developer Portal](https://developer.data.gov.my/)
fields.description_ms: [String] Endpoint yang diminta; senarai penuh endpoint yang disediakan boleh didapati melalui [Portal Pembangun](https://developer.data.gov.my/)

fields.name: hits
fields.description_en: [Integer] Number of requests made to the specific endpoint
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan permintaan yang dibuat ke endpoint tersebut

fields.name: hits_prop
fields.description_en: [Float] Number of requests made to the specific endpoint, as a percentage of total hits
fields.description_ms: [Float] Bilangan permintaan yang dibuat ke endpoint tersebut, as a percentage of total hits
